sqlRequest:
SELECT dbo.[User].[id], dbo.[User].[enabled], dbo.[User].[email], dbo.[User].[prenom], dbo.[User].[nom], dbo.[Role_User].[id_role], dbo.[Role].[name], dbo.[Role].[id_client] FROM dbo.[User]

        LEFT JOIN dbo.[Role_User]
        ON dbo.[User].[id] = dbo.[Role_User].[id_user]
        LEFT JOIN dbo.[Role]
        ON dbo.[Role].[id] = dbo.[Role_User].[id_role]

        WHERE dbo.[User].[email]
        IN ('brouillaud','john.xerri@linkt.fr')
        OR dbo.[User].[nom]
        IN ('brouillaud','john.xerri@linkt.fr')
        OR dbo.[User].[prenom]
        IN ('brouillaud','john.xerri@linkt.fr')
